rows.label: qst202206_msg001
rows.name:
Such a beautiful sight... I've
never seen anything like it.

rows.label: qst202206_msg002
rows.name:
Yeah, you said it. And it's
all thanks to Raiko's power!

rows.label: qst202206_msg003
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Ehehe... Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst202206_msg004
rows.name:
Raiko, are you getting more confident
about using your powers now?

rows.label: qst202206_msg005
rows.name:
Yes! Thanks to all of you, I think
I've got it down perfectly.

rows.label: qst202206_msg006
rows.name: Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst202206_msg007
rows.name: No, we didn't do much of anything.

rows.label: qst202206_msg008
rows.name:
That's right. It was all you,
Raiko. You worked hard for this.

rows.label: qst202206_msg009
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]That's not true! I could only
do my best because you were
all there to support me!

rows.label: qst202206_msg010
rows.name: *sniffle*... Uuuu...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202206_msg011
rows.name: Whoa! Turtle-chan, are you crying?

rows.label: qst202206_msg012
rows.name:
It's just... feels like I'm
watchin' my own daughter grow
up... Brings a tear to my eye...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202206_msg013
rows.name:
"Daughter"?[ML:Dash ] You should probably get
married first, don't you think?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202206_msg014
rows.name:
Raiko, you overcame your weakness
with your own strength. That has
surely helped you grow many times over.

rows.label: qst202206_msg015
rows.name: You've done a truly wonderful job.

rows.label: qst202206_msg016
rows.name: Yes! Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst202206_msg017
rows.name:
So, um...[ML:Dash ] There's something
I'd like to ask...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202206_msg018
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: qst202206_msg019
rows.name:
Do you remember the boy I
made cry back in Torigo?

rows.label: qst202206_msg020
rows.name: Oh, the kid you gave a little shock to?

rows.label: qst202206_msg021
rows.name:
Back then, I'd come to
hate my own power, so I
just ran away from him...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202206_msg022
rows.name:
I want to see him and apologize
properly...[ML:Dash ] If he's still crying, this
time I want to be the one to help him.

rows.label: qst202206_msg023
rows.name:
I see. All right, then.
Let's go find him together!

rows.label: qst202206_msg024
rows.name: You'll really help me?!

rows.label: qst202206_msg025
rows.name:
Of course. Let's show him
how much you've grown!

rows.label: qst202206_msg026
rows.name: Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst202206_msg027
rows.name:
Okay, let's head to Torigo and
ask around to find that boy.

rows.label: qst202206_msg029
rows.name: Yes!
